# include<bits/stdc++.h>
# define LL long long int
# define pb push_back

using namespace std;

LL gcd(LL a,LL b)
{
    if (b==0)
        return a;
    return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main(void)
{
    LL T ,n, k , Q;
    for (scanf("%lld",&T);T--;)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        vector<LL> vec;
        bool flag = false;
        LL max = 0x00;
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&Q);
            vec.pb(Q);
            if (Q%5)
                flag = true;
        }
        
        LL min = LONG_MAX;
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            while (!(vec[i]%5))
                vec[i] /= 5;
            while (!(vec[i]%3))
            vec[i] /= 3;
            if (max < vec[i])
                max = vec[i];
            if (min > vec[i])
                min = vec[i];
        }
        
       if (min==max)
            printf("Yes\n");
        else
            printf("No\n");
    }
    return (0);
}
